main event: A witness observed a sudden white flash trail from a round object about the size of a baseball while stopped at an intersection.
interesting points: The object changed direction multiple times before disappearing., The report indicated that the case was classified as INCOMPLETE., It was noted that the object appeared to be moving circularly., The incident involved a military source from Plattsburgh Air Force Base., Subsequent investigations provided no conclusive information about the object.
sighted object: a round object about the size of a baseball
witness description: A person stopped at an intersection in their car
